thread.title: Reports: Centers For Disease Control Climate Summit Canceled After Election
thread.title_full: Reports: Centers For Disease Control Climate Summit Canceled After Election

author: Matt Shuham
title: Reports: Centers For Disease Control Climate Summit Canceled After Election

organizations.name: centers for disease control and prevention

text:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention canceled a climate change and health summit months in the making without offering an official explanation, multiple news outlets reported Monday.
One summit co-sponsor reportedly claimed that the CDC had canceled the event in anticipation of political uncertainties posed by the new Trump administration.
Read More â†’
